ComicInfo.Summary:
“BURY YOUR FAMILY, BURN YOUR ENEMIES”
Been waiting to find out just how deep the rabbit hole goes? Join us for a Rothschild funeral as the heads of the world’s secret houses of money attend.
END OF ARC ONE.
